Smart Resume Design to Look & Feel Premium. Amazing Experience With Smooth Scroll. Looks Great & Loads Fast On Every Devices.

Redx Resume Template

A modern and intuitive Resume Design to make you look smart and sharp. Download now and showcase your self online. RedX Resume template is well organized and easy to customize.

Resume Template designed to highlight your strong points to help anyone looking to hire you to quickly know your skills.

This Resume template is suitable for anyone who want to have a smart looking resume.

  • Developers
  • Software Engineers
  • Freelancers
  • Web Designers
  • Marketing Professionals
  • And many others

Features includes:

  • Smoooth Scrolling
  • Touch Friendly Sliders
  • Cross Browser Compatible
  • Valid HTML5 & CSS3
  • Responsive Layout
  • Different Color themes
  • Clean Code
  • Online Documentation
  • W3C Validated code
  • Bootstrap Compatible
  • 100% Customizable
  • Font Awesome Icons
  • Well-commented code
  • Google Fonts
